snippet: Victoria Azarenka, winner of the Australian Open, has withdrawn from her Fed Cup opening match against Christina McHale because of a lower back injury.
abstract: Victoria Azarenka, winner of the Australian Open, has withdrawn from her Fed Cup opening match against Christina McHale because of a lower back injury.
lead_paragraph: 12:47 p.m. | Updated WORCESTER, Mass. - The new W.T.A. No. 1, Victoria Azarenka, has withdrawn from what was to be her first match since winning the Australian Open, pulling out of her opening Fed Cup match Saturday against Christina McHale of the United States because of a lower back injury.

headline.main: Azarenka Withdraws from Fed Cup Match
